en-GB.summary: Check rowing conditions for Reading Rowing Club  based on current water flow rates
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask can I row today
Alexa, ask can I row today what is the current flow rate
Alexa, ask can I row today can I row today
en-GB.name: Can I Row Today
en-GB.description: This skill helps rowers at Reading Rowing Club check current water flow conditions to determine if it's safe to row. It connects to the UK Environment Agency's real-time flood monitoring data to provide current flow rates and appropriate safety restrictions based on the water conditions.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Ask 'Can I row today?' or 'What is the current flow rate?' to get current rowing conditions.
